title: Best Of: Emojis -- The New Mating Call?

description:
On today’s throwback show, Emily is giving her expert advice on common sex and dating dilemmas to get you headed in the right direction for amazing sex.

Plus, Emily gives advice on ways to communicate if you’re concerned that your partner is NOT masturbating, how to know when to stop the casual dating and dive back into something serious, and which emojis will most likely get a you a text back.

Thank you for supporting our sponsors who help keep the show FREE:

Apex, Promescent, Jopen, Good Vibrations, and SiriusXM.

Follow Emily on all social: @sexwithemily.

For even more sex advice, tips & tricks, visit: sexwithemily.com.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
